title: Mozart - Complete Piano Concertos - Vladimir Ashkenazy
description:
Music : Classical : Lossless



MOZART: THE COMPLETE PIANO CONCERTOS

"The history of the piano concerto without Mozart would be like Hamlet without the Prince." --Jeremy Siepman


 
Composer: Wolfgang Mozart
Soloist: Vladimir Ashkenazy
Conductor: Daniel Barenboim
Orchestra: Philharmonia Orchestra
Label: Decca
Ripped with: EAC/FLAC



This 10 CD set includes all 27 of Mozart's Piano Concertos, as well as the two Rondos from K382 and K386 which were composed as alternative finales for Nos. 5 and 12 respectively. The set includes cadenzas by Mozart himself, Ashkenazy, and even one by Beethoven. I personally rather enjoy Ashkenazy's playing of anything, but particularly these concertos.

I've ripped the CDs to individual tracks, however, I've still maintained the original track order for each of the CDs. In addition, I've also included log files, scans of the covers & a 31-page booklet (in English and en Francais), and, as with all of my previous uploads, ensured that all files are tagged properly.

Hope you enjoy -- unless you're a leecher, in which case I hope something large runs over you! ;)
